description: Your meat-free weeknights never tasted so good! You wonâ€™t waste time in the kitchen whipping up this classic Spanish omelette featuring creamy potato, onion and egg. Serve with pickled cabbage and a dollop of sour cream.
name: Potato Tortilla With Pickled Cabbage Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 brushed potatoes, peeled, cut into 1.5cm pieces
100g green beans, trimmed, cut into 4cm lengths

recipeInstructions.text: Place cabbage in a bowl. Drizzle with vinegar and toss to combine. Set aside.

Cook potatoes in a large saucepan of boiling water for 2-3 minutes or until just tender. Drain. Heat oil in a 20cm (base) heavy-based flameproof frying pan over medium-low heat. Add onion and potato. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 12 minutes or until potato is golden and onion is tender. Add garlic, cumin and beans. Cook for 30 seconds or until fragrant

Lightly beat eggs and milk together in a jug. Season with pepper. Pour egg mixture over potato mixture in pan. Gently shake the pan to evenly distribute egg mixture. Cook, without stirring, for 5 minutes or until just set around the edge.

Preheat oven grill on medium-high heat. Place pan under grill and cook for 5 minutes or until golden and set. Transfer to a serving board. Dollop with sour cream and top with cabbage and parsley. Season with pepper. Serve.
